about_the_game:
The demo has the first three maps of the game.

Play as the Hacker, trapped in the virtual dome known as Sector 598 being lead and controlled by the ADMIN for the past 28 years. Things change once the Hacker finds out there is something sinister going on, can you fight your way out and escape in this turn based strategy game?



20 Unique maps and levels. In this 3-5 hour story with 3 endings.

Create new allies by finding hidden collectables. You will need all the help you get to escape.

Uncover the mystery of Sector 598. Only those who dare to escape will uncover the truth.

Do you dare to escape?

content_descriptors.notes: Themes of human experimentation is explored and shown non-graphically.

name: Sector 598 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: I3-2130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated
  • Storage: 426 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Can work on lower harder, hasn't been tested.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 4300G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ Graphics
  • Storage: 426 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Everything runs at full speed confirmed with this hardware.
